metadata.title: CVE-2020-35501 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernels implementation of audit rules, wherea syscall can unexpectedly not be correctly not be logged by the auditsubsystem

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
